member.name: T:Insight.Database.Json.JsonNetObjectSerializer
member.summary: Handles serializing objects to JSON by using the JSON.NET serializer.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.Json.JsonNetObjectSerializer.Serialize(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Serializes an object to a string.
member.returns: The serialized representation of the object.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.Json.JsonNetObjectSerializer.Deserialize(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Deserializes an object from a string.
member.param: The encoded value of the object.
The type of object to deserialize.
